pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graph-Constrained Robust Covariance Estimation // Contains a function by the same name, which provides two types of robust t-M-estimators of scatter subject to zero-constraints in the inverse. The methodology is described in Vogel Tyler (2014) doi:10.1093/biomet/asu041. See the robFitConGraph function documentation for further details. A tutorial including background information is given by Vogel, Watt Wiedemann (2022) arXiv:2204.04291.
